## PopulatableEthersStabilio.unstakeSTBL() method

Withdraw STBL from staking.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unstakeSTBL(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedEthersStabilioTransaction<void>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of STBL to withdraw. |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedEthersStabilioTransaction](./lib-ethers.populatedethersstabiliotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;void&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the STBL stake's [collateral gain](./lib-base.stblstake.collateralgain.md) and [XBRL gain](./lib-base.stblstake.xbrlgain.md)<!-- -->.
